title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!Livecasino.io Promo for this week is for 1mBTC Evolution Blackjack Free Chip!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #33 will work like this:Reward1mBTC Evolution Blackjack Free Chip!How?Opt-in by sending PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #33 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Wager at least 10 mBTC on any games on Livecasino.io, including slots!Make at least deposit during campaign periodPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Sunday 25th September 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the rewardOpposite bets (e.g.: 1/2 on red + 1/2 on black in Roulette) will not be considered for the wagering requirementThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 26th September, 17:00 GMTFree bet has 1 x wagering requirementAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent, rewardNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still apply, including multi-account restrictionsWe hope you enjoy!Fl√°vio from livecasino.io team
